channel.title: [317] Requesting Host
channel.description:
Hello, my name is Bronson and I'm looking for someone to host my server. I would do this myself but my main computer broke and I don't have the time or money to fix it. The server is a 317 PI that I've just begun to code. I'm open to a source switch if the host does not like the base that is being used or would just like to start fresh from another. This of course is only temporary until I get the money necessary to purchase a VPS. You will receive owner alongside myself and a set amount of the donation profit each month. Anyone who is interested can contact me through this site or send me a contact request on Skype stating why you are adding me, thank you.
Skype: bronson.bon
